data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Aerosoft - Airport Rio de Janeiro Intl V2.0
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


This scenario was building from studies and research on the International Airport of Rio de Janeiro / Galeão. This is a replica of the airport "real", everything was done in accordance, general lighting, runways, taxiways, patios, decks, buildings, hangars, terminals and other, consistent with the 95% Galeão Airport.

Features:


  • Orthophoto textures and Occlusion environment
  • The Christ the Redeemer statue is included
  • Custom Runways, ground and taxiways textures
  • 3D Grass
  • Custom Jetways (AutoGate Ready)
  • Animated objects, vehicles, people and aircraft
  • Animated Ground Traffic and aircraft traffic
  • Night texture and HDR lighting
  • Modeled Underpass under runways M and N (Bridges)
  • Customized Approach Lighting System - ALS
  • Construction work on current expansion is included
  • Light Version included (for systems with less performance)
  • Manual in English and Portuguese Language
  • Charts included

New features in version 2.0:


  • New Pier South Terminal
  • New Floor and Layout Pier South
  • New Jetways Textures
  • New Layout Solo TPS1 / TPS2
  • New Layout Patio Loads Terminal
  • New Texture of the Patio Floor and Taxiways
  • New Track Texture 15/33
  • New Track Texture 10/28
  • Added South Pier Solo Service.
  • Patio Lighting Adjustment
  • Performance Tuning
  • New boarding bridges
  • New Fingers Textures

To use the functions from AutoGate, you need the free AutoGate Plug-in. You can download it for free via http://marginal.org.uk/x-planescenery/plugins.html.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
